resources.string: Rich, bold shot of pure coffee with a smooth, intense flavour.
Smooth, rich espresso diluted with hot water for a balanced, clean taste.
Smooth and creamy with steamed milk and a gentle, comforting taste.
Light, foamy top with a rich body and a well-rounded, velvety taste.
A perfect balance of rich coffee and steamed milk.
Rich blend of coffee and chocolate with a hint of sweetness.
Sharp shot of coffee marked with a touch of milk for balance.
Chilled and mellow, brewed slowly for a rich taste with gentle strength.
Hot water topped with espresso, offering a bold yet clean coffee experience.
Finely ground coffee simmered to a rich, unfiltered brew with deep intensity.
